div.p: This code system https://www.napkon.de/fhir/CodeSystem/napkon-vaccination-module defines the following codes:

tr.td: Willingness for additional SARS-CoV-2 vaccination if recommended
To protect myself from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or from COVID-19
To protect my private environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
To protect my work environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
Because I am afraid of being discriminated against due to my vaccination status (e.g. travel ban, work ban).

description.value: NAPKON Vaccination Module Code System - Collection of vaccination module-specific codes that are missing from common terminologies such as SNOMED CT
